price: It is He Who gave you life, then will cause you to die, then He will bring you back to life. Indeed, man is ever ungrateful.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡيَاكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī aḥyākum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥ'yīkum inna al-insāna lakafūrun
translations: He will cause you to die
